intro: Ouratea densa, commonly known as the dense ouratea, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the family Ochnaceae and is characterized by its dense, evergreen foliage and showy, clustered white or pale yellow flowers. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 6 meters. Its leaves are opposite, simple, and often have a glossy surface. The fruit is a capsule that splits open to release small, winged seeds.
